item.title: Volvo FH12-16 I Generation v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 1, 2025

Volvo FH12-16 I Generation v1.0 ETS2

The Volvo FH12-16 I Generation refers to the first generation of Volvo’s flagship heavy-duty truck, the FH series, which was produced from 1993 to 1998. This truck was a groundbreaking vehicle for its time, winning the “International Truck of the Year” award in 1994.

The “FH” stands for “Forward control High entry,” highlighting its driver-focused, high-mounted cab design. The numbers, 12 and 16, denote the engine displacement in liters.

Key Characteristics of the First Generation
Innovative Cab Design: The cab was a significant step forward in driver comfort and safety. It featured a more spacious, aerodynamic design and was built with a strong emphasis on crash safety, a hallmark of Volvo’s design philosophy. The famous Globetrotter cab with its high roof was a popular choice for long-haul drivers.
Engine Technology: The first-generation FH series introduced the all-new D12A engine for the FH12 model. This was a 12-liter, in-line six-cylinder engine with an overhead camshaft and unit injectors. For the FH16, the truck used a revised version of the 16-liter engine from the previous generation of Volvo trucks.
Performance and Handling: The FH12-16 was praised for its excellent ride and handling, as well as its advanced features like the Volvo Engine Brake (VEB), which provided powerful and reliable braking assistance.

Volvo FH12-16 I Generation in ETS2
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), the first-generation Volvo FH is a popular choice for mods. Since it’s not a default truck in the game (which focuses on modern European trucks), the modding community has created numerous highly-detailed, standalone versions.

These mods are a hit with players who:
Appreciate classic trucks: They offer a nostalgic and different driving experience compared to the sleek, modern trucks in the base game.
Enjoy customization: Many mods come with a huge array of customization options, from various chassis and engine configurations to authentic paint jobs, interiors, and accessories.
Seek realism: Modders often go to great lengths to get the details right, including realistic engine sounds, gearboxes, and handling physics that reflect the feel of the original truck.

item.title: Scania torpedo 2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 1, 2025

Scania torpedo 2 v1.0 ETS2

The term “Scania Torpedo 2” in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) refers to a popular and highly detailed truck mod, and it’s a bit of a special case. The “Torpedo” name is a nickname for the classic Scania T-series trucks, which are known for their long, protruding hoods (bonnets). The “2” in the name often signifies a specific version of the mod, an updated version, or a variant that adds new features or improvements.

The Scania T-series trucks were discontinued by Scania in 2005, which is why they aren’t in the base game of ETS2. However, they are incredibly popular with modders and players who love classic, long-nosed trucks. The modding community has created numerous versions of these trucks, with the most famous being the one by RJL, a well-known and highly respected modder.

What to Expect from a Scania Torpedo Mod
A quality Scania Torpedo mod, like the one by RJL, is far more than just a new truck. It’s a complete package that offers an enormous amount of customization. You can typically expect:

Multiple Cabin and Chassis Options: The mod usually includes various cabin sizes (Normal, Topline, Longline) and a wide array of chassis configurations (4×2, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4, and more). This allows you to build a truck for any purpose, from a standard hauler to a massive show truck.
Extensive Customization: This is the highlight. You can customize nearly every part of the truck, including bumpers, grilles, fenders, sunshields, side skirts, and exhausts. You can even choose different engine sounds and interiors to make the truck truly your own.
Realistic Details: The modders put a lot of work into making these trucks as realistic as possible. This includes detailed interiors, proper Scania engine badging, and accurate physics.
Standalone Mod: Most of these mods are “standalone,” meaning they don’t replace any of the default trucks. You buy them from the in-game Scania dealer, and they function just like a regular truck in your fleet.

How to Find and Install the Mod
Since the Scania Torpedo is not an official truck, you have to get it from the modding community. The easiest way to get a reliable, updated version is to look for it on the Steam Workshop. Many of the best mods are available there and can be installed with just one click. You can also find them on various third-party modding sites.

Once you download the mod, you just need to place the file into your “mod” folder for ETS2 and then enable it in the game’s Mod Manager before loading your save file. Just make sure the mod is compatible with your current version of the game to avoid crashes or issues.

The Scania Torpedo is a fan favorite for a reason. It’s a way to bring a legendary truck back to life and create a unique driving experience that’s all your own.

Credits: jorge

item.title: MARCOPOLO G6 1800 DD 8X2 VOLVO v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 1, 2025

MARCOPOLO G6 1800 DD 8X2 VOLVO v1.0 ETS2

The Marcopolo G6 1800 DD 8×2 with a Volvo chassis is a specific and highly sought-after bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). This bus is an iconic model from the Brazilian manufacturer Marcopolo, known for its elegant design and double-decker configuration.

Here’s a breakdown of what this particular mod offers and why it’s so popular:

The Real Bus : Marcopolo Paradiso G6 1800 DD
The Marcopolo Paradiso G6 1800 DD is a double-decker coach that was a flagship model for the company. The “G6” refers to the sixth generation of the Paradiso line. The “1800 DD” stands for Double Decker. A key detail is the 8×2 chassis, which means it has eight wheels in total, with two of the axles being driven. This configuration provides better stability and carrying capacity, perfect for long-distance routes. When paired with a Volvo chassis, like the B420R or B450R, it becomes a powerful and reliable vehicle.

The Mod in ETS2
The mod for ETS2 recreates this legendary bus with a lot of detail, allowing players to experience driving a double-decker bus on a virtual European or Brazilian map. These mods often include:

High-Quality Model: The bus is meticulously modeled to look and feel like the real Marcopolo G6. This includes the exterior body, lighting, and interior details.
Realistic Volvo Chassis : The mod typically features the correct Volvo chassis, giving you different engine and transmission options that are true to life. This affects the bus’s performance and handling.
Extensive Customization : Just like other popular bus mods, you can expect a wide variety of customization options. This includes different paint jobs (often from real-world Brazilian bus companies), interior trims, and accessories.
Animated Features: High-quality mods will have animated parts like opening doors and luggage compartments, which adds to the realism of the experience.
Passenger Mods : Many players use this bus mod in conjunction with a passenger mod, which allows them to pick up and drop off virtual passengers at bus stations, turning the game into a true bus simulator.
